resources.string: Are You Sure Want To Reset All Amounts To 0 !!!!
Oooops...You\'ve Already Stored This Month Expenses...Try Next Month
Are You Sure To Reste All Amounts To 0!!!!
The easiest way to plan your budget and keep controll over your finances

Set your balance first. At the bottom you\'ll find \'Balance\' option. Click on it , provide your income source then your Amount of balance. After that click on save button. Great now you\'re good to go. ( Next time if you have same income source that you\'ve provided , from \'select income source\' you can select it. No need to type it again.

Create your expenses. At the bottom you\'ll find \'Add Expense\' option. Click on it. Now provide your expense category name. ( eg: TRANSPORT ). Provide your expense name ( eg: Bus ). Provide your budget for this expense. ( eg: 1000 ). Then click on \'Add\' button. Congratulations you\'ve successfully created your very first expense. Note : Budget is an entity which means that , how much of amount you\'re going to spend for a particular month.
Lets enjoy your daily expenses management through our handsome application
Sorry!! your device does not support voice system

Mohidul Hoque Arif
 Joy Kumar Pal


A Product From MangoSoft
Do you wish to Send This Agrrement To

* Provide The Income Source. eg: BUSINESS.
 * Provide The Income Amount. eg: 20000
 * If You Have Previous Income Source Then Select It From The Top Option.

* Provide The Expense name. eg: BUS. 
* Provide The Budget For This Expense. eg: 2000 
* Provide The Expense Category. eg: TRANSPORT 
* If You Have Already The Category Then Select It From The Top Option
